Changes looks reasonable. I hope I can soon find some cycles to get back to the Layout() revamping I have in the pipe :)

I think we should also clear the |needs_layout_| flag here, since that won't happen if Layout() is overridden.

views/view.cc:237: // valid, but not our parent.
I can see this is necessary as long as people call Layout() themselves :)
